author: brane
msg: Factor teminal error handling into a helper function.
(main): Call error_exit instead of copying the code all over.

author: breser
msg: Our tests should not try and enforce security updates.  Many vendors patch
releases of packages rather than upgrade to the latest version.
Look for 0.24.4 of neon which is the latest known working version.

author: lundblad
msg: Fix formatting error introduced in r9628.

author: jpieper
msg: Really fix the URI encoding/decoding problem in
(svn_client__repos_locations): After URI decoding the input path at
the beginning, re-encode the resulting two URLs before returning
